title: The Ghost Studies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/22/18
itunes:title: The Ghost Studies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/22/18
description:
George Noory and paranormal researcher Brandon Massullo examine his new theories on what causes hauntings by ghostly apparitions and communications from the dead.
